text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Dedication to the American people?! 120k lost to COVID-19 cause he min calling it the next dem hoax. Their is more divisiveness in this country than ever before. 40 mil out of work. supports hatred / violence against anyone he doesn’t agree with. U picked the wrong horse genius!
